title: Senjou no Valkyria 2: Gallian Ouritsu Shikan Gakkou - Our Only Days
original_name: 戦場のヴァルキュリア 2-our only days-
sinopse: Three manga adaptations were released by Sega after the release of Valkyria Chronicles II in Japan. Valkyra Chronicles II: Our Only Days is a shojo variation of the manga. (Source: Wikimedia)
